channel.title: Comments on: Lima’s Magic Water Circuit, Parque de la Reserva
channel.description: my little place on the web

item.title: By: Stefan
item.dc:creator: Stefan
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/2011/07/08/limas-magic-water-circuit-parque-de-la-reserva/#comment-32">Pam Winders</a>.
Thanks Pam :)

item.title: By: Pam Winders
item.dc:creator: Pam Winders
item.description: Wow Stefan in your quest to enrich YOUR life you are enriching the lives of everyone who reads about your adventures continue to enjoy and stay safe Cheers Pam
item.content:encoded: Wow Stefan in your quest to enrich YOUR life you are enriching the lives of everyone who reads about your adventures continue to enjoy and stay safe Cheers Pam
